product.longDescription:
Choose the right tool head for the job and switch out quickly with a simple push-button release. The Connecta™ tool has been thoughtfully designed by Johnny's to withstand the rigors of market gardening by using rust-resistant materials for years of use. High-quality cast aluminum alloy receiver and stainless-steel heads are perfect for precision cultivation.

This kit includes:
• Ashwood handle with Connecta Receiver
• Connecta Collinear 4 head (3.75" wide)
• Connecta Collinear 7 head (6.75" wide)
• Connecta Triangle 4 head (3.75" wide)
• Connecta Triangle 6 head (5.75" wide)
• Stainless-steel carrying clip
product.shortDescription: New! An interchangeable tool system built to last.
